product_name: Sanuk You Got My Back II Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Can't get away with flip-flops at the office? Try these slip-on Sanuk You Got My Back II Shoes that sport canvas uppers on a flip-flop base. Billed as a sandal-shoe hybrid, You Got My Back II Shoes are cotton canvas uppers on sandal bottoms. Cotton canvas uppers look great no matter where you go; subtle stretch gores offer slip-on ease and comfort. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move and spread for natural shock absorption and stability. Recycled thermoplastic elastomer midsoles offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on. Outsoles of the Sanuk You Got My Back II Shoes are made from partially recycled rubber to match durability with pillowy cushioning. Sanuk You Got My Back II Shoes are vegan friendly. Closeout.
short_description: Can't get away with flip-flops at the office? Try these slip-on Sanuk You Got My Back II Shoes that sport canvas uppers on a flip-flop base.
